title: `torch.Tensor.new_empty((3, 2))` gives weird error
body_html:
I think this is something that I would try as a confused user and end up more confused at the error:

In [7]: torch.Tensor.new_empty((3, 2))
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-7-62523255e019> in <module>()
----> 1 torch.Tensor.new_empty((3, 2))

TypeError: descriptor 'new_empty' requires a 'torch._C._TensorBase' object but received a 'tuple'

In [8]: torch.Tensor.new((3, 2))
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-8-2232049e79b4> in <module>()
----> 1 torch.Tensor.new((3, 2))

TypeError: descriptor 'new' requires a 'torch._C._TensorBase' object but received a 'tuple'

cc @SsnL @gchanan

body:
I think this is something that I would try as a confused user and end up more confused at the error:

```
In [7]: torch.Tensor.new_empty((3, 2))
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-7-62523255e019> in <module>()
----> 1 torch.Tensor.new_empty((3, 2))

TypeError: descriptor 'new_empty' requires a 'torch._C._TensorBase' object but received a 'tuple'

In [8]: torch.Tensor.new((3, 2))
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-8-2232049e79b4> in <module>()
----> 1 torch.Tensor.new((3, 2))

TypeError: descriptor 'new' requires a 'torch._C._TensorBase' object but received a 'tuple'
```
cc @SsnL @gchanan
